channel.title: Dan Hannnigan
channel.description: Personal website for Dan Hannigan, front end developer, designer, and community leader in Denver, Colorado.

item.title: Redesigning my website for 2022, inspired by... trains?
item.description: Much like the shoemakers' children, my website has oft received very little attention and care that I give to my professional work. This year I wanted to return to my design roots and take a crack at making something for myself that I'd be proud of.
item.content:encoded: Much like the shoemakers' children, my website has oft received very little attention and care that I give to my professional work. This year I wanted to return to my design roots and take a crack at making something for myself that I'd be proud of.
item.author: hi@danhannigan.dev (Dan Hannigan)

item.title: My month-long focus on digital decluttering
item.description: After spending most of 2022 dealing with generalized anxiety disorder, caused by many reasons: always being online, health, and well... *gestures broadly*; I decided to take a break from my community ( Denver Devs ) and Discord. That snowballed into disconnecting from a lot more.
item.content:encoded: After spending most of 2022 dealing with generalized anxiety disorder, caused by many reasons: always being online, health, and well... *gestures broadly*; I decided to take a break from my community ( Denver Devs ) and Discord. That snowballed into disconnecting from a lot more.
item.author: hi@danhannigan.dev (Dan Hannigan)
